title: Code of Conduct

what: Tools for Working with Airbnb Datasets
title: Tools for Working with Airbnb Datasets
text: goal airbnbtools streamline process working Airbnb datasets, offering tools downloading, transforming, modeling data. package provides several functions automate tasks data acquisition, data cleaning, model training evaluation, helping make data analysis workflow efficient.

title: Tools for Working with Airbnb Datasets
text: can install development version airbnbtools GitHub :

title: Tools for Working with Airbnb Datasets
text: ‚Äôs simple example use download_combine_data() function, downloads Airbnb data given URLs, adds metadata (city weekdays/weekends columns), combines single data frame.
code: # Load the airbnbtools package library(airbnbtools)  # Define URLs for the datasets urls <- list(   berlin_weekdays  = "https://zenodo.org/records/4446043/files/berlin_weekdays.csv",   berlin_weekends  = "https://zenodo.org/records/4446043/files/berlin_weekends.csv",   london_weekdays  = "https://zenodo.org/records/4446043/files/london_weekdays.csv",   london_weekends  = "https://zenodo.org/records/4446043/files/london_weekends.csv" )  # Download and combine the data combined_data <- download_combine_data(urls)  # To view the combined data head(combined_data)
